recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Mix eggs with cheese. Fry pancetta. Combine all with pasta.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, curry powder, coconut milk, onions, garlic, ginger
recipes.instructions: Fry onions, garlic, ginger. Add chicken and curry powder. Pour coconut milk and simmer.
